The second version of '''[[Minecraft Indev]]''' was released on '''February 6, 2010''', at 21:03 UTC<ref>{{cite IRC log|Adura|file=2010-02-06_#minecraft.log|tz=standard|date=February 6, 2010|"(16:06:29) <Notch> how was it before this update?"}}</ref>, to fix bugs in [[Indev 20100206-2034|the previous version of Indev]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bread JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bread]]'''
* Is no longer stackable.{{Verify|Could bread stack to begin with?}}

== Fixes ==
'''From Indev 20100206-2034'''
* Fixed [[arrow]]s crashing the game.
